item.description: A state that just had a Republican Governor less than a month ago will now only have 1 out of 11 Congressional seats held by a Republican after Democrat gerrymandering. Every red state needs to fight fire with fire. Wake up to the war weâ€™re in.

item.description: A lot of posts criticizing Elon get massive reach on ğ•. If this was about controlling narratives, Elon would have limited the reach of posts attacking him. On top of that, recommendation algorithm on ğ• is open source, and no one, including Elon, is immune to Community Notes.
